titles.title: A bill to prohibit any active duty, commissioned officer of the Armed Forces of the United States from serving as the Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Manpower and Personnel (Arm Serv).
Committee on Armed Services requested executive comment from Defense Department.

bill.summary: 3/11/1987--Introduced. Prohibits any active duty, commissioned officer in the armed forces from serving as the Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs, or any other similar position.
